Hello, I'm a software engineer in Utah with interest in iOS/OSX development, data engineering/analytics, network security, and building server-side systems (services & distributed systems). If only there were more hours in the day... and red bull were cheaper...


I guess simply put I like building complex systems.

I go to classes at Brigham Young University, work part-time at Domo, do research at the BYU Internet Security Research Lab, hack away on my numerous side projects, and go to Denny's at 2am with friends.
